column4: Of the many things I enjoy doing... one of the highest has  got to be sitting in bed with me EEE.
Sorry if I'm going on about it. You see, I live in South Africa where the EEE isn't  available. It took 5 weeks to import mine, and I got it 2 days ago. So I'm happy!
Guess what's coming soon? An 8-cell 10500mah battery for me EEE... which should give me around 10.5 hours on Ubuntu ;) *high-five*
i just bought the same one, yay
Awesome! I gotta import mine, so its about a month to go.
